programme.title: Ozone loss and cancer
programme.short_synopsis: Senate report links growing number of skin cancers with ozone loss.
programme.medium_synopsis: Time to stay out of the sun? Special Senate report links ozone loss with increasing skin cancers.
programme.long_synopsis:
Time to stay out of the sun? Special Senate report links ozone loss with increasing skin cancers.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
